lines.text: Man, I still can't check that thing for tattoos.
I guess it's pretty clear it used to be a <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard,</c> since someone had to cast that <c=#0000FF>Living Memory,</c> but...
Well, maybe the tattoos are new, and needed time to heal, so, uh...
They... coated him in some sort of therapeutic mud mask, and it hardened on?
Wait... no, hang on. Something... coated... hardened on...
